Provider Networks

Andrew Bruce

Source: vignettes/articles/networks.Rmd
networks.Rmd
library(provider)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)
library(igraph)
library(ggraph)
library(tidygraph)

Provider Networks 

ga <- provider:::georgia_reassignments()
#> Error in `read_qs()`:
#> ! The package "qs" is required.
# ga |> 
#   filter(!is.na(organization)) |> 
#   arrange(desc(reassignments)) |> 
#   slice(50000:n())
southland <- ga |> 
  filter(pac_org == "1153563770") |> 
  mutate(individual = stringr::str_glue("{first} {last}")) |> 
  select(organization, 
         individual,
         associations,
         entry, 
         reassignments_org = reassignments, 
         pac_org, 
         enid_org, 
         npi_ind = npi, 
         pac_ind = pac, 
         enid_ind = enid)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ga' not found
southland
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'southland' not found
individuals <- southland |>
  filter(associations > 5) |> 
  distinct(npi_ind, .keep_all = TRUE) |> 
  pull(npi_ind) |>
  map_dfr(~reassignments(npi = .x)) |> 
  mutate(individual = str_glue("{first} {last}")) |> 
  select(individual,
         organization, 
         associations,
         entry, 
         reassignments_org = reassignments, 
         pac_org, 
         enid_org, 
         npi_ind = npi, 
         pac_ind = pac, 
         enid_ind = enid) |> 
  filter(organization != "SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC")
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'southland' not found
individuals
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'individuals' not found

{igraph} 

bound_ig <- igraph::graph_from_data_frame(bind_rows(southland, individuals), directed = TRUE)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'southland' not found
bound_ig
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'bound_ig' not found
plot(bound_ig, 
     vertex.label.cex = 0.5, 
     vertex.size = 3, 
     vertex.color = "gray90", 
     vertex.frame.width = 1)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'bound_ig' not found



{tidygraph} & {ggraph} 

south_grph <- tidygraph::as_tbl_graph(southland, directed = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(importance = centrality_degree(mode = 'all'))
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'southland' not found
south_grph
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'south_grph' not found


ind_grph <- tidygraph::as_tbl_graph(individuals, directed = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(importance = centrality_degree(mode = 'all'))
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'individuals' not found
ind_grph
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ind_grph' not found


p <- ggraph(ind_grph, "graphopt") + 
  geom_edge_link(arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.5, 'mm')), 
                 end_cap = circle(2.5, 'mm'), edge_width = 0.3, edge_alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_node_point(
    #aes(size = importance), 
                  show.legend = FALSE, 
                  alpha = 0.5, 
                  color = 'steelblue') + 
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name), 
                 repel = TRUE, 
                 size = 1.25, 
                 #label.size = 0.1,
                 check_overlap = FALSE) +
  theme_graph(fg_text_colour = 'white')
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ind_grph' not found
